metadata.name: Suspicious Installer Package Child Process
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of suspicious child processes from macOS installer package parent process. This includes osascript, JXA, curl and wget amongst other interpreters

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/package_script_service')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/installer'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sh')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/bash')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dash')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/python')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ruby')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/perl')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/php')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/javascript')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/osascript')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/tclsh')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/curl')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/wget'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('preinstall')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('postinstall'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of suspicious child processes from macOS installer package parent process. This includes osascript, JXA, curl and wget amongst other interpreters

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate software uses the scripts (preinstall, postinstall) References: https://redcanary.com/blog/clipping-silver-sparrows-wings/, https://github.com/elastic/detection-rules/blob/4312d8c9583be524578a14fe6295c3370b9a9307/rules/macos/execution_installer_package_spawned_network_event.toml
